channel.title: Vac R&D Roadmaps and Reports
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Vac R&D Roadmaps and Reports

item.title: ACZ Research Destination
item.description: Providing ACZ research informative materials for the ecosystem.

item.title: de-mls Testnet
item.description: Implementation of a de-mls testnet, extending the previous poc and writing the corresponding RFC.

item.title: IFT ZK Calls
item.description: Preparation and conducting the ZK meetings.

item.title: LibP2P mix protocol
item.description: Publishing a raw RFC specifying libp2p mixnet protocol and implementing a PoC.

item.title: Think tank
item.description: Publishing a reviewing document for the cryptography modules of IFT projects.

item.title: Zerokit v.0.6
item.description: Implementation of the next release of Zerokit.

item.title: Applied Cryptography and Zero-knowledge Service Unit
item.description: vac:acz: § ift: § zerokit-v0.6 de-mls-testnet libp2p-mix-poc think-tank acz-research-destination-2024q4 ift-zk-calls-2024q4 waku: § waku-rln-relay codex: § nomos: § nes § nescience-consulting nimbus: §.

item.title: Nescience Consulting
item.description: Creating a review document on the specification and architecture of the Nescience node.

item.title: Waku RLN Relay
item.description: Providing implementation support to Waku RLN relay for solving the related issues.

item.title: proxy-re-encryption
item.description: vac:acz:consulting:codex:proxy-re-encryption § %%{ init: { 'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#BB2528', 'primaryTextColor': '#fff', 'primaryBorderColor': '#7C0000', 'lineColor': '#F8B229', 'secondaryColor': '#006100', 'tertiaryColor': '#fff' } } }%% gantt tickInterval 1month dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD section Status Proxy Re-Encryption: , 2024-05-27, 2024-09-30 status: 50% CC: Ramses + 1 Description § To embed and assist codex with their proxy re-encryption primitive.
